name: Spoon Ultimate (HTML VERSION)
description:
So Shrek was going to NewYork but got yeeted to Russia...

Press E to open the code menu and press Backspace to exit some screens and click to continue

-------------Codes-------------

315=Level1

243=Level2

115=Level3

412=Le vel4

212=Level5

514=Level6

154=Level7

451=Soundtest (Secret)

251=Final Level Stop Him

555=Giga Ugly Chase (Secret)

331=Chronicles (Secret)

440=Battlemode Walmart (Secret)

420=Spinoider

422=True Final Boss

-------------Cheats-------------

031=Activate Cheat Mode

301=Unlimited Jumps (Only works on the main game)

255=Unlock Hero Mode
